page.title: 10River Leam, Leamington Spa.
page.content: The{River Leam}is approximatley 30km long. It flows in an easterly direction, it starts at the village of Woolscott and ends in{Leamington {Spa}when it runs into the {River Avon. On a study of the {River Leam }we tested the p.h. value of the water opposite {Victoria park }in { {Leamington Spa}. The p.h. value of the water is 7 which means that the water is neutral.We made a net using a piece of cloth,wire and a stick.We took a few sweeps and we caught a {Sludgeworm}which suggested that the water was polluted, but then we found a{Mayfly Nymph }which meant that the water is clean. We decided with the p.h. value and the {Mayfly Nymph}that the water in the {River Leam} is unpolluted.
